promQLQuery.expr: sum by (namespace, code) (rate(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="$containerName", code=~"[45].."}[15m])) / ignoring(code) group_left sum by (namespace) (rate(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="$containerName"}[15m]))

sum by (method) (rate(http_request_size_bytes_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="$containerName"}[5m])) / sum by (method) (rate(http_request_size_bytes_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="$containerName"}[5m]))

sum by (method) (rate(http_response_size_bytes_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="$containerName"}[5m])) / sum by (method) (rate(http_response_size_bytes_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="$containerName"}[5m]))
